sentences.en: A footnote is made at the bottom of the page.
As a footnote, I should add that there was one point on which his bravado was more than justified.
sentences.cn: 我补充一句，他有时表现得过分逞强。

sentences.en: I noticed that the author of our textbook frequently referred by footnote to these library books.
sentences.cn: 我还注意到，从图书馆借来的这些书，恰是课本的著者经常在脚注中提到的。

sentences.en: I'm afraid that his name will now become a footnote in history.
sentences.cn: 恐怕他的名字现在会成为历史的注脚。

sentences.en: Index not allowed in footnote, endnote, header , footer, or comment.
sentences.cn: 脚注 、 尾注 、 页眉 、 页脚或批注中不允许有索引.

sentences.en: Table not allowed in footnote endnote , header, footer, annotation, or text box.
sentences.cn: 不能在脚注、尾注 、 页眉 、 页脚 、 批注或文本框中使用表格.

sentences.en: Table not allowed in footnote, endnote, header, footer, comment, or text box.
sentences.cn: 脚注 、 尾注 、 页眉 、 页脚 、 批注或文本框中不允许有目录.

sentences.en: That biography is an illuminating footnote to our times.
sentences.cn: 那篇传记对我们这个时代是个很有启发性的补充说明.

sentences.en: The asterisk refers the reader to a footnote.
sentences.cn: 星号是让读者参看脚注.

sentences.en: The asterisk refers to a footnote.
The explanation in the footnote - fied the difficult sentence.
sentences.cn: 注脚的解释使这一难句容易明了.

sentences.en: The insertion point cannot reside just before a footnote marker.
sentences.cn: 插入点不能在紧临脚注标记的前面.

sentences.en: There was an interesting footnote to the story.
sentences.cn: 那则故事有个有趣的注脚。

sentences.en: Today, my foremost concern should be to research the folklore of my home country so that I can finish the footnote to my report.
sentences.cn: 今天，我最主要关心的应该是研究祖国的民间传说，那样我就可以完成我的报告的脚注了。

sentences.en: Type the text you want for the custom footnote or endnote mark.
sentences.cn: 您必须为自定义的脚注或尾注标记键入一些文本.

sentences.en: You entered multiple destinations for a page, line, footnote , endnote, or comment.
sentences.cn: 您为页 、 行 、 脚注 、 尾注或批注输入了多项目标.

sentences.en: You entered multiple destinations for a page, line, footnote, endnote, or annotation.
sentences.cn: 您输入了多个页 、 行 、 脚注 、 尾注或批注目标.

sentences.en: You must type some text for a custom footnote or endnote mark.
sentences.cn: 您必须键入一些文字来自定义脚注或尾注标签.

trans.tran_en: a note at the bottom of the page in a book, which gives more information about something

trans.tran_cn: 给…作脚注；在脚注里评议
